item.title: Skillcape emotes and client.java
item.dc:creator: @m_is_ftw m is ftw
item.description:
@m_is_ftw wrote:

just keep changing the cape and animation add it as a command

if (command.startsWith(skillcape) && playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2677) {
setAnimation(3157);
stillgfx(287, absY, absX);
} else if playerEquipment[playercape] == 2678 {
setAnimation(3157);
stillgfx(287, absY, absX);
